datafield.subfield: Savage Gold and Silver Mining Company (Virginia City, Nev.)
Consolidated Chollar, Gould, and Savage Mining Company
NUCMC data from Nevada Historical Society for Savage Mining Company records, 1864-1927
(Savage Mining Company, mining company of Virginia City, Nev.; reincorporated in 1904 as the Savage Gold and Silver Mining Company)
NUCMC data from Nevada Historical Society for Consolidated Chollar, Gould, and Savage Mining Company records, 1930-1954

(Consolidated Chollar, Gould, and Savage Mining Company, Gold Hill, Nev.; consolidated Chollar Gold and Silver Mining Corporation, Gould and Curry Mining Company, and Savage Gold and Silver Mining Company to form a new company in 1933)
